meanings.definition: To fill with sudden and overpowering surprise or wonder.
meanings.sent1: The magician's trick truly astonies the audience.
meanings.sent2: The unexpected plot twist in the movie astonies everyone.
meanings.sent3: The talking dog astonies the cat with its ability to speak.
meanings.sent4: The beauty of the sunset astonies me every evening.
meanings.sent5: The grand fireworks display astonies the entire town.

meanings.sent1: The acrobat's performance astonies the crowd with its daring stunts.
meanings.sent2: Her talent for painting astonies everyone who sees her work.
meanings.sent3: The clever parrot astonies its owner by mimicking their words perfectly.
meanings.sent4: The speed of the cheetah astonies all other animals in the savannah.
meanings.sent5: The size of the whale astonies the marine biologists studying it.
